nodes.text: Marvel Age 10 was the tenth issue of Marvel Comics' promotional magazine, Marvel Age, published October 11th, 1983, with a January 1984 cover date. It included the article Beyond Star Wars by Patrick Daniel O'Neill, discussing the upcoming issues of the Star Wars comic that will take place after Return of the Jedi with editor Louise Jones and writer Mary Jo Duffy. It also included solicitation information for Star Wars 82.
